Самая потрясающая логическая игра. Рекомедована к игре как детям так и совсем взрослым. Увлекательные головоломки, интересный сюжет, НИАЖЫДАНЫЕ повороты. По пунктам:
Графика - В
Сюжет - У
Игровая механика - П
Юмор - В
Персонажи - П
Мультиплеер - У

Итог: Выше ожидемого (В)

П-Превосходно
В-Выше ожидаемого
У-Удовлетворительно
С-Слабо
О-Отвратительно
Д-Дерьмо

Just finished the single player mode of Portal 2- Absolutely fantastic, the characters are fantastic, the graphics are top-notch and the voice acting is just brilliant. The physics are excellent, too! You HAVE to buy this game, I really recommend it!

I heard nothing but good things about this game which is why I decided to try it out. I like puzzle games, but this game is nothing like any other puzzle game I've played. The mechanics are fresh and new, but I think my favorite part about the game is the incredibly sarcastic humor that seems to never end. The puzzles are challenging but not so much that it's frustrating. Overall a great game!

Building on the popular Portal, the sequel once again puts you in Chell's shoes, as you navigate ever more complex puzzles. There are some new additions to the testing environments, which only serve to create ever more interesting ways of dealing with obstacles, including the not so friendly turrets, poison water and surfaces you can't portal through.

The charm and humour are still very much there, and it feels like a much more fleshed out Portal. Honestly, it's the most fun I've had with a puzzle game in a very long time, and it's definitely made me want to go back to the original Portal and complete it once more. By far the most fun you can have with portals.
One of the best gaming series ever

Jogo bem elaborado: bonitos gráficos da engine do Half-Life 2, cenários futurísticos, ótima jogabilidade e tema bem diferente. Você deve criar portais em dois locais com sua arma para passar as fases. Modo COOP fantástico! Muito divertido. Aprovado!

Si Portal 1 ya era un juegazo, Portal 2 es una obra digna de culto. Una secuela de Portal que aumenta el nivel de esta gran saga, metiendo más personajes, más diálogos, más humor de GLAdOS, metiendo los geles para dar más juego, entrando en la historia de Aperture Science, y para rematar, puedes hacer tus propias cámaras de manera muy fácil y rápida, así como jugar cámaras que la comunidad ha subido a la Workshop. Para mí, uno de mis juegos favoritos. Creo que no me equivoco si digo que este juego está dentro de mi TOP 3, una obra de arte. 11/10

This is a great puzzle game within a larger story-line. I really enjoyed the characters' voice-overs, which are quite amusing as well; simply amazing! Can't wait for portal 3 to emerge at some point in time!

The single player campaign was way too short and nobody plays co-op and you're going to have a hard time finding anybody to play with because both campaigns don't really have much replay value to'em so nobody really sticks around for a tenth play through or anything. There is user created content, but they vary in quality and I just don't feel like wading through all of it to find a gem.

Simplesmente perfeito!!!!

Se você jogou o primeiro Portal vai achar esse aqui bem mais fácil, mas mesmo assim a experiêcia e diversão que o jogo passam vale a pena demais.

Puzzles inteligentes e alguns vão pedir uma resposta rápida do jogador, o que deixa o jogo mais divertido e desafiador.
O modo Co-op é perfeito também, com campanha própria e bem divertida.

Resumindo, esse é um jogo que possívelmente vai agradar a 100% das pessoas ou pelo menos uns 99.9999% delas...XDDD

Recomendado.

Nota: 10/10

This game is just brilliant! Very few bugs, and the only ones I encountered were graphical bugs, so no big deal.

The story is funny as hell, the controls pretty easy and the puzzles pretty hard at times.
There's also a coop mode, which is hella fun (you can kill your partner on purpose :P).

9/10

This is honestly one of the best games I have ever played. It has great graphics for when it came out, and can be hard as F@#$. Yet it is still hard to stop playing. The dialouge sugests a playful banter between the characters. And for once a games has good physics. You can also build a test chamber and upload it to the workshop for others to play. All in all one of my favorite games...

Ohne viele Worte gleich eines vorweg: Es ist eines der besten Spiele, die zur Zeit auf dem Markt zu finden sind.

Da wären die Knobelaufgaben, die besonders in den späteren Spielstunden für ordentlich Gehirnschmalz sorgen und der brilliante Humor, der sich im Vergleich zum ersten Ablager noch einmal gesteigert hat.
Hinzu kommen der wirklich tolle Co-Op Modus, der lokal sowie online funktioniert (die beiden Figuren sind dazu noch irgendwie ein passendes Paar) und der fordernde Challengemodus.

Alles in allem eine klare Kaufempfehlung,
bei der man gerade jetzt im Wintersale zuschlagen sollte (4,99,-€ !!).

ああ、これはおかしいです。とにかく、このゲームは私が推測するかなりクールです。それは驚くべきではありませんが、私はあなたはそれが方法でユニークだと言うことができると思います。私はむしろハローを果たしたが、私も完成ヘイロー4をやりなさいとき、私は本当に、それを判断するの誰だと思います。あなたは、魚にintrestedている場合は、あなたはこのゲームを購入する必要があります！そうでない場合は、あなたの自己を殺す行く。ばか。

И так, что можно сказать про Portal 2.
Начну пожалуй с минусов. Он только один, русская локализация. Она не сильно отвратительная и от оригинала почти не отличается, НО, эмоции которые в оригинале, они почти все пропали в локализации и были моменты когда пропадал звук и был отвратный, не знаю как это назвать но похожий на писк.
Теперь плюсы.
+Графика:
Графоуни здесь превосходный для 2011, четкий и без мыла.
+Звуковое сопровождение:
Саунд в игре восхитительный, особенно песенки турелей. 
+Геймпелей:
Геймплей тут уникальный и мега интересный. Пока только 3 игры заставляли меня перепроходить их из-за геймплея и сюжета (об этом позже), Метро 2033, Метро ЛН. Игровая составляющая здесь заставляет сильно поработать мозгами, что не может не радовать, ибо мало игр заставляют думать так, как это делает портал.
+Сюжет:
Про него даже ничего говорить не надо, он настолько щикарен, что хочется проходить игру снова и снова, ради того, чтобы найти что-то новое для себя в лоре игры.
+Кооператив:
Нет ничего веселее чем тупить на пару с другом в коопе. Уровней от valve не так много, но они довольно сложные, ну а когда заканчиваются они, то в бой идет мастерская и там по истене находятся "гении" из-за которых у тебя возгорается бомболюк.
Итог:
100 картофельных батареек из 10

The portal series at first was boring but there was something that kept me playing. I don't know what it was but for sure, it wasn't the story. For some people this game had a good story but for me, a person who plays a game for a deep story, would say that the story is not the best but then again, it's not entirely bad so I'd give it average. Where I'd recommend this game is from the gameplay on its own. Just imagine you're a mouse trapped in a maze and you have to do certain tricks to open up new pathways; that's what this game is and it has a very satisfying feel to it. 

If you're expecting an action packed game, then this is not the game for you. If you enjoy time killer mini puzzles, this game is perfect in that aspect. The levels aren't all that difficult but some levels are so large you lose track of the goal and get lost which might require a bit of backtracking. This game can be finished in one sitting, about 6.5 hrs for me but since I purchased it on the winter/summer sales it's totally worth it. It is definitely worth playing if you're tired of the typical shoot to kill type games.

Portal 2 is a masterpiece from Valve. Everything in it was so great to see and play. I love the story and the graphics.

The modding community that was behind it created some really great fan mods/maps that I also very much spent hours in to.
